text: السيد فهد جرادات Fahd Mohammad Musa Jaradat (1930 – 19 May 2015) was a Jordanian soldier and politician who served as Finance Minister. Jaradat was born in Bushra in 1930. He joined the Jordanian Armed Forces in 1948. He amongst others held the post of military attaché in Iran. In 1970 he was named Finance Minister. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Finance ministers of Jordan Category:Jordanian military personnel Category:People from Irbid Governorate
title: Fahd Jaradat
